properties.address: Reading rooms, Billericay, Essex CM12 9AS
properties.description: Human Kind is a new Billericay based charity and soon to be not-for-profit kindness café, opening early 2024 in Billericay High Street. Our aim is to help combat loneliness and social isolation and to connect the community by providing a safe and welcoming space for all. As we prepare the Human Kind café for launch, we are currently holding weekly community sessions on a Wednesday from 10am to Midday in the Reading Rooms (73 High Street, Billericay) and offer a warm and friendly welcome to all members of the community for group activities, quizzes, games and arts and crafts. Equally, should you merely wish to sit and enjoy the company of others around you, there is no pressure to join in. Refreshments are available, the kettle is always on and all are welcome.
